data.name: Showcase
data.description:
Did you create a cool way of automating a challenge solution? Did you have a unique insight into something about the kernel? Did you find a way to mine bitcoin on our VMs? This is your opportunity to win some points and showcase your work, even if you didn't solve all the flags.

Send us a ModMail with your solution script and any insightful feedback you have to help us improve this exercise in future years.

We are looking to understand how people approach the kernel challenges, and what methods they apply to solve them.

Let us know your level of prerequisite experience in operating systems as well when you send us your ModMail.
